LineageScrollResult.description: The model for the result of a lineage search query

entities.description: A list of entities returned from the search results

metadata.description: Metadata specific to the browse result of the queried path

scrollId.description: Scroll Identifier for subsequent requests, if not present then no further results to fetch

pageSize.description: Size of each page in the result

numEntities.description: The total number of entities directly under searched path

LineageSearchEntity.description: The model for each entity returned by the lineage search query

entity.description: Urn of the entity being returned

restrictedAspects.description:
A list of the the restricted aspects on the entity.
If the key aspect is present, assume ALL aspects should be restricted including the entity's Urn.

extraFields.description: Extra fields from the search document based on what is requested in the search request

paths.description:
Optional list of entities between the source and destination node.
There can be multiple paths from the source to the destination.

path.description: Optional list of entities between the source and destination node

degree.description: Degree of relationship (number of hops to get to entity)

degrees.description: The degrees of separation (number of hops) between the source and this entity

explored.description: Marks an entity as having been explored for as a part of the graph walk

truncatedChildren.description: Indicates this destination node has additional unexplored child relationships

ignoredAsHop.description: Whether this relationship was ignored as a hop while performing the graph walk

SearchResultMetadata.description: The model for the search result

aggregations.description: A list of search result metadata such as aggregations

suggestions.description: A list of search query suggestions based on the given query

name.description: The name of the aggregation, e.g, platform, origin

displayName.description: Name of the filter to be displayed in the UI

aggregations.description: List of aggregations showing the number of documents falling into each bucket. e.g, for platform aggregation, the bucket can be hive, kafka, etc

SearchSuggestion.description: The model for the search result

text.description: The suggestion text for this search query

score.description:
The score for how close this suggestion is to the original search query.
The closer to 1 means it is closer to the original query and 0 is further away.

frequency.description: How many matches there are with the suggested text for the given field
